title: Webex Meetings for iPad now lets you multitask with Picture in Picture during video calls
content:
In October last year, Cisco announced its new Webex Meetings app for the iPad. Now, the company is finally enhancing the Picture in Picture support so users can take advantage of multitasking features while using the iPad.

moreâ€¦

The post Webex Meetings for iPad now lets you multitask with Picture in Picture during video calls appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Webex Meetings is finally enhancing the Picture in Picture support so users can take advantage of multitasking features while using the iPad.
